publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1248 Brian Adam: Condemnation of Post Office Closures in Aberdeen-That the Parliament condemns Post Office Ltd's proposals to close 14 out of Aberdeen's 40 post offices and calls on the Scottish Executive to make the strongest possible representations to prevent these wholesale closures.

S2M-1248 Condemnation of Post Office Closures in Aberdeen (lodged on 4 May 2004) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Christine Grahame*, John Swinburne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Shiona Baird*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1248 Condemnation of Post Office Closures in Aberdeen (lodged on 4 May 2004) Robin Harper*, Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-1248 Brian Adam: Condemnation of Post Office Closures in Aberdeen-That the Parliament condemns Post Office Ltd's proposals to close 14 out of Aberdeen's 40 post offices and calls on the Scottish Executive to make the strongest possible representations to prevent these wholesale closures. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Christine Grahame, John Swinburne, Mr Adam Ingram, Shiona Baird, Rosie Kane, Robin Harper, Dr Jean Turner, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1248 Condemnation of Post Office Closures in Aberdeen (lodged on 4 May 2004) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-1248 Condemnation of Post Office Closures in Aberdeen (lodged on 4 May 2004) Jim Mather*, Alex Johnstone*
